headline: SOLSTICE ADVANCED MATERIALS TO HOST INAUGURAL INVESTOR DAY
summary: Solstice Advanced Materials Inc. ("Solstice" or the "Company") will host an Investor Day at the Nasdaq MarketSite in New York City today, ahead of its planned spin-off from Honeywell (Nasdaq: HON), as previously disclosed. The in-person event will begin at 12:30pm EDT and a live webcast will begin at 1:30 p.m. EDT, which will be available through the Investor Relations section of Honeywell's website at www.honeywell.com/investor.

headline: HONEYWELL AND LS ELECTRIC ANNOUNCE GLOBAL PARTNERSHIP TO ACCELERATE INNOVATION FOR DATA CENTERS AND BATTERY ENERGY STORAGE SYSTEMS
summary: Honeywell (NASDAQ: HON) today announced a global strategic collaboration with LS ELECTRIC (KRX:010120) to jointly develop and market hardware and software solutions that simplify the power management and distribution for data centers and other building operators, helping improve operational efficiency and resiliency.

headline: Jim Cramer Thinks Honeywell’s Breakup Could Pay Off
summary: Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON) is one of the stocks in Jim Cramer’s game plan for this week. headline: Aircraft Lighting Market Forecast Report 2025-2033, with Profiles of RTX, Astronics, Diehl Stiftung, Honeywell, Thales, Luminator Aerospace, Oxley, STG Aerospace, Aveo Engineering and Cobalt Aerospace
summary: Opportunities in the aircraft lighting market include the integration of smart systems for enhanced passenger experience, retrofit programs for older aircraft, and demand for energy-efficient solutions to support sustainability goals. Innovations in dynamic lighting and safety advancements in exterior applications also present growth avenues.
